body: So I'm  sure a lot of people know my old account names but I keep on switching (iznot4fun and YoUrFaCeHaHa) I'm a bit bored so AMA. I'll answer anything even if you don't want to hear it :P
body_tagged: So I'm  sure a lot of people know my old account names but I keep on switching (iznot4fun and YoUrFaCeHaHa) I'm a bit bored so AMA. I'll answer anything even if you don't want to hear it :P
title: Ayy Ama

replies.body:
Why did you choose your name to be so poorly written like that?

If you didn't choose to spell like that on purpose... then I take that back :/
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
@NitroFunky Uhh I like The Librarians 1,2 and 3
@Vlad a joke my friend came up with
@Nathan My friend wanted this name and he was making fun of Autism and he needed 1 more day to wait to change it and I took it and spelt it exactly the way he wanted it...

replies.body: But autism doesn't stop you from spelling things. Dyslexia does.

replies.body:
uhm.. If you're autistic then you may have trouble with writing.. But it's the severity aye..
Like dyslexic people can write, they just may find it hard ;)
